price: Za one koji su Allahove poslanice dostavljali i od Njega strahovali, i koji se nikog, osim Allaha, nisu bojali. A dovoljno je to što će se pred Allahom račun polagati!
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُبَلِّغُونَ رِسَٰلَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَخۡشَوۡنَهُۥ وَلَا يَخۡشَوۡنَ أَحَدًا إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ حَسِيبٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yuballighūna risālāti al-lahi wayakhshawnahu walā yakhshawna aḥadan illā al-laha wakafā bil-lahi ḥasīban
